column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Fire Lord Ozai , you and your forefathers have devastated the balance of this world , and now you shall pay the ultimate price !
#Text=" Lion turtle says : " In the era before the Avatar , we bent not the elements but the energy within ourselves .
#Text=" Lion turtle says : " To bend another 's energy , your own spirit must be unbendable or you will be corrupted and destroyed .
#Text=" Ozai says : " What ?
#Text=What did you do to me ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I took away your firebending .
#Text=You ca n't use it to hurt or threaten anyone else ever again .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You did it !
#Text=You should 've seen yourself , it was amazing !
#Text=You were all like and the Fire Lord was all like " Suki says : " So did you , you know ... finish the job ?
#Text=" Ozai says : " I 'm still alive .
#Text=" Aang says : " I learned there was another way to defeat him and restore balance .
#Text=I took his bending away .
#Text=" Toph says : " Wow !
#Text=Who taught you that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " A giant lion turtle .
#Text=" Toph says : " You have the craziest adventures when you disappear .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , look at you , buster .
#Text=Now that your firebending 's gone I guess we should call you the Loser Lord .
#Text=" Ozai says : " I am the Phoenix King !
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , sorry .
#Text=Did n't mean to offend you , Phoenix King of Getting His Butt Whooped .
#Text=" Suki says : " Yeah !
#Text=Or how about King of the ... Guys Who ... Do n't Win ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Leave the nicknames to us , honey .
#Text="
